official_title: To amend the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974 to authorize a homeowner to recover treble damages from the homeowner's mortgage escrow servicer for failure by the servicer to make timely payments from the escrow account for homeowners insurance, taxes, or other charges.

summary.text: Homeowners' Escrow Payments Assurance Act - Amends the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974 to authorize a homeowner to recover in court treble damages for failure of a servicer of a federally related loan to make timely payments into the attendant escrow account.
